channel.title: Comments on: Creamsicle
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: By: ms.borgeson
item.dc:creator: ms.borgeson
item.description: One of my favorite flavors. I’m working my way through all the flavors this is definitely one of the best. It’s the perfect amount of orange creamy Goodness, Reminds me of the ice cream pop soo freakin good! Definitely worth a try!
item.content:encoded: One of my favorite flavors. I’m working my way through all the flavors this is definitely one of the best. It’s the perfect amount of orange creamy Goodness, Reminds me of the ice cream pop soo freakin good! Definitely worth a try!

item.title: By: Lobo G.
item.dc:creator: Lobo G.
item.description: Best flavor i tried so far fresh for the summer and creamy for winter great balance!!!! Delicious!!!! Cloud Chemistry is really another level, i dont like orange that much but with Creamsicle that dont even matter at all!!!
item.content:encoded: Best flavor i tried so far fresh for the summer and creamy for winter great balance!!!! Delicious!!!! Cloud Chemistry is really another level, i dont like orange that much but with Creamsicle that dont even matter at all!!!

item.title: By: ohmpunisher
item.dc:creator: ohmpunisher
item.description: Everyone's favorite creamsicle as a child has been reinvented to be enjoyed as a vape. You cannot go wrong with this flavor fam, it has been OP approved.
item.content:encoded: Everyone’s favorite creamsicle as a child has been reinvented to be enjoyed as a vape. You cannot go wrong with this flavor fam, it has been OP approved.

item.title: By: Dee Scott
item.dc:creator: Dee Scott
item.description: You know those orange cream ice creams everyone likes? Well that's creamsicle to the T . A well deserved orange punch with a awesome cream exhale. I'm drooling thinking about it
item.content:encoded: You know those orange cream ice creams everyone likes? Well that’s creamsicle to the T . A well deserved orange punch with a awesome cream exhale. I’m drooling thinking about it
